flawed_nl_solution:
The hunting season last 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 months
So he goes hunting 3*6=<<3*6=18>>18 times a year
That means he gets 18*2=<<18*2=36>>36 deers per year
So he catches 36*600=<<36*600=216000>>216000 pounds of deer a year
That means he keeps 216000/2=<<216000/2=108000>>108000 pounds of deer a year

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21600.0, not 216000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
